message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I have to consider my costs as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $9800? It's my final offer
I understand that you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise again and offer it to you for $10000.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to make some adjustments. Can you consider $9500? It's my final offer
I understand that you're trying to squeeze out every last penny, Bob. But I'm not willing to go below $10250. That's my final offer.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not comfortable going above $9800. Can you reconsider?
I'm not willing to go below $10000, Bob. I think we're getting close, but I need to make a profit. I'll meet you halfway between your last offer and my previous one. I'll offer it to you for $9750.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $9500? It's my final offer
